DIY Smart Mirror

May 29, 2016

I have decided that this summer I will be tackling a do it yourself smart mirror. I know many people have already created their own versions of a smart mirror, but I think it looks cool, so why not make my own as well :) Basically I will be creating my own UI to fit my needs, so I am hoping I can add something that has not be done before. Also, I want to implement some additional sensors to the mirror, for example a motion sensor so the mirror is not always on.
